snippet: Neighbors of a new business on Lenox Avenue complained that its look was too garish, and recalled an earlier, uglier time.
abstract: Neighbors of a new business on Lenox Avenue complained that its look was too garish, and recalled an earlier, uglier time.

headline.main: A New Sign, and a Liquor Store Becomes a Wine Shop
headline.print_headline: After a Liquor Store’s Genteel Makeover, Harlem Has a Change of Heart
